taskbody.context: At any time, you can generate the code to be integrated into the Triple'A Plus component. The code is automatically compiled by the application based on the properties and relationships of the objects.

step.cmd:
To select the artifacts to be generated, right-click on the project, and select
Properties Design Studio Code Generation
.
step.info: For more information about the artifacts, see Related Reference topic: Project Properties.

step.cmd: Do one of the following in the DS Navigator view pane:

choices.choice: If you want to generate code for all files in the project, right-click on the project and select Generate Code .
If you want to generate code for all files of a specific package, right-click on the package and select Generate Code .
If you want to generate code for a specific file, right-click on the file and select Generate Code .

result.p: A Java project projectName-gen is created (or updated). This project contains the relevant generated artifacts to integrate into Triple'A Plus.

taskbody.postreq: If you are working with cdm-wui-models , you need to perform the additional steps described in section Compiling cdm-wui-models-gen .
